user_input: Lately I’ve been feeling really tired all the time, even if I sleep well. I get super thirsty, like I can’t drink enough water, and I have to pee a lot, especially at night. Sometimes I feel kind of shaky or dizzy if I don’t eat for a while. I’ve also noticed I’ve been losing a bit of weight without trying, and my cuts take longer to heal.
plan:
{
  "daily_plan": [
    "Monitor blood sugar levels and adjust insulin intake as prescribed by healthcare professional",
    "Maintain a balanced diet with appropriate carbohydrate, protein, and fat intake, avoiding processed foods and sugars",
    "30-minute brisk walk or other moderate-intensity exercise, as tolerated",
    "Ensure 7-8 hours of uninterrupted sleep",
    "Practice stress reduction techniques such as deep breathing, meditation, or yoga for 5-10 minutes daily",
    "Take prescribed medication for thyroid disorder and adrenal insufficiency as directed by healthcare professional",
    "Regularly monitor thyroid function tests and adrenal hormone levels as advised by healthcare professional"
  ]
}
schedule:
{
  "schedule": [
    "07:00 AM - Monitor blood sugar levels and adjust insulin intake",
    "08:00 AM - Eat healthy breakfast",
    "09:00 AM - Walk for 30 minutes",
    "10:00 AM - Practice stress reduction techniques",
    "12:00 PM - Eat balanced lunch",
    "01:00 PM - Take prescribed medication for thyroid disorder and adrenal insufficiency",
    "02:00 PM - Rest or light activity",
    "07:00 PM - Eat balanced dinner",
    "08:00 PM - Practice stress reduction techniques",
    "09:00 PM - Ensure 7-8 hours of uninterrupted sleep",
    "10:00 PM - Regularly monitor thyroid function tests and adrenal hormone levels"
  ]
}
feedback: I'm feeling a little better after following the health plan.
